price: ߊߟߊ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߟߝߊߙߌ ߟߎ߬ ߘߐߞߣߍ߫ ߟߴߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߸ ߓߊߏ߬ ߊߟߊ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߟߐ߲ߠߌ߲ߠߊ߫ ߥߘߋ߬ߥߘߋ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَيُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wayubayyinu al-lahu lakumu al-āyāti wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
